data-item.title: Safety Inspector
data-item.data-subitem: Strengthened safety procedures that resulted in 75% fewer accidents on days I was absent.
Pioneered workplace stress-reduction methods that worked for at least one employee.

data-item.title: Chief of Police
data-item.data-subitem: Secured community support in almost-successful effort to expel organized crime from city.

data-item.company: Moe's Tavern and Homer's Hunting Club
data-item.data-subitem: Engaged patrons in witty, whimsical, avuncular dialog covering topics such as the arts, philosophy, politics, and spectator sports. Launched remodeling project that led to 100% reduction in clientele (including myself).

data-item.title: Astronaut
data-item.data-subitem: Averted in-flight disaster by forcing giant ants out of cockpit during space shuttle mission.

data-item.title: Owner, Chief Marketing Officer, and Chief Driver for Snow-Plowing Business
data-item.data-subitem: Boosted business 15% by executing late-night TV marketing campaign targeting homeowners who were too wasted to shovel their driveways Deliberated at length before rescuing man trapped beneath mountain avalanche.
